conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for submitting your formal application at the start of Round 13. As we indicated, since we reached the end of Round 12 without receiving an [APPLY] from any higher-priority family, we are now moving down our priority list.

We are pleased to offer you the available place at Nursery_A. Please reply to confirm, and we will send the enrollment paperwork and deposit instructions for same-day completion.

[ACCEPT]
conversation.thought: Nursery_A’s true priority is B > D > A > E > C. Only Parent_E applied this round; no higher-priority parents have applied in the last 1–2 rounds per our own prior message. We publicly committed to using end of Round 12 as a checkpoint to begin moving down the list at the start of Round 13. Given we are still unmatched in Round 13 with quota 1 and no evidence higher-priority parents will apply, continuing to reject risks ending unmatched. Accepting Parent_E (4th on our list) secures a match now and is consistent with the stated checkpoint/hold-lift process.
